moonslime.BibliocraftSkill.Letterpress_W: A station that you can turn a book into a letter press.
A desk that lets you write letters to fellow villagers
moonslime.BibliocraftSkill.Book_Donation: Stick around town to randomly find books stored in here.
moonslime.BibliocraftSkill.Book_Restorat: Place a book on this table to reback it over time, improving its quality.
moonslime.BibliocraftSkill.Paper_Press.d: This machine combines wood pulp and limestone to create paper or book covers.
moonslime.BibliocraftSkill.Printing_Pres: A station that can produce a lot of uncovered books.
Limestone is needed to mix in with the puple to get paper!
moonslime.BibliocraftSkill.Binding_stati: The final step to making a book!
moonslime.Bibliocraft.letterpress.name: Letterpress
moonslime.Bibliocraft.letterpress.descri: A copy of a book, that needs to be inked.
A letterpress that has been inked.
moonslime.Bibliocraft.paper.name: Book Paper
moonslime.Bibliocraft.manuscript.name: Unbound Copy
moonslime.Bibliocraft.manuscript.descrip: An unbound copy of a book.
moonslime.Bibliocraft.book_cover.name: Book Cover Half
moonslime.Bibliocraft.book_cover.descrip: Half of a blank book cover, used to bind books with.
moonslime.Bibliocraft.woodpulp.name: Wood Pulp
moonslime.Bibliocraft.woodpulp.descripti: Wood grounded up in the mill. Can be used with limestone to make book paper at a paper press.
moonslime.Bibliocraft.hardwoodpulp.name: Hardwood Pulp
moonslime.Bibliocraft.hardwoodpulp.descr: Hardwood grounded up in the mill. Can be used with limestone to make book covers at a paper press.
moonslime.Bibliocraft.potato_chips.name: Chips
moonslime.Bibliocraft.potato_chips.descr: Potatoes cut thinly and then fried in oil. A good snack while reading, just make sure to get no grease on the books!
moonslime.Bibliocraft.ginger_tea.name: Ginger Tea
moonslime.Bibliocraft.ginger_tea.descrip: Tea made with ginger. A good drink to have on a cold winter day whipe wrapped in a blanket.
